sentences.english: The Thunderbolt gained fame as the most powerful and actively used American fighter-bomber used extensively for targeting ground installations.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到雷電因此成爲了美國最著名的戰鬥轟炸機。

sentences.english: Seems to me the desire here is a semi stealthly fighter bomber that is affordable.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來這是架廉價的半隱形戰鬥轟炸機。

sentences.english: The thirty - six Enterprise dive-bomber were being squandered in a jittery shot from the hip.
sentences.chinese: 這三十六架“企業號”上的俯衝轟炸機正被孤注一擲。

sentences.english: It became the most successful bomber used in World War One.
sentences.chinese: 成了第一次世界大戰中戰功最卓著的一種轟炸機。

sentences.english: Just then, a whole flight of bombers zoomed over the house.
sentences.chinese: 就在這時，一整隊轟炸機從房子上空呼嘯而過。

sentences.english: It was the most perfidious and dangerous dive bomber the Germans had.
sentences.chinese: 這是德國人擁有的最出色而危險的俯衝轟炸機。

sentences.english: Photos and videos of the new stealth bomber were published on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 一種新型隱形轟炸機的圖片和視頻也在網上公佈。

sentences.english: A Lancaster bomber in reasonable condition is worth rescuing.
sentences.chinese: 一架狀況尚好的蘭開斯特轟炸機值得搶救。

sentences.english: In 1963 a Lancaster bomber crashed on Wallis Island.
sentences.chinese: 1963年，一架蘭開斯特轟炸機在瓦立斯島墜毀。

sentences.english: As soon as enemy bomber formation was sighted, the squadron leader gave the order to peel off.
sentences.chinese: 轟炸機羣，中隊長立即命令自己的飛機散開。

sentences.english: The 456th Bomber Group, based in Italy, had gone into Austria.
sentences.chinese: 基地在意大利的第456轟炸機羣剛剛飛進奧地利。

sentences.english: The Air Commodore briefed the bomber crew on their dangerous mission.
sentences.chinese: 空軍准將向轟炸機機組下達執行危險義務的各項指示。

sentences.english: Israeli warplanes bombarded a port city in southern Lebanon.
sentences.chinese: 以色列轟炸機轟炸了黎巴嫩南部的一個港口城市。

sentences.english: French bombers had made the first air strike of the no-fly resolution.
sentences.chinese: 法國轟炸機完成了禁飛決議後的第一輪空襲。

sentences.english: Opti the Mystic had been born in that bomber's wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 於是，在轟炸機的殘骸裏，一個老樂天誕生了。

sentences.english: Certainly one German bomber landed voluntarily in Devonshire.
sentences.chinese: 的確曾有一架德國轟炸機自動地在德文郡降落。

definition: opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
military aircraft/secret plan/Privy Council during the Qing dynasty
aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
